headline: Stock Market Strategy: InCred Equities lists 21 stocks to buy this June
intro: Despite a 4% gain in benchmark indices in 2025, Indian equity markets remain volatile due to global trade tensions. InCred Equities recommends 21 stocks with an ?Add? rating, highlighting a favorable monsoon and strong GVA growth as key positives for investors.
imagecaption: Stock Market Strategy: InCred Equities lists 21 stocks to buy this June

headline: Primer: Can dissenters aid shareholder democracy?
intro: According to IiAS?s review, most shareholder resolutions of Nifty 500 companies pass because the promoters hold the majority 51% of shares. Their holdings are significant. Public shareholders make up about 27% of ownership.
imagecaption: In Nifty 500 companies, even when a majority of public shareholders oppose a resolution, it?s not enough to stop it from being approved.

headline: Vizhinjam Seaport: 10 key things about the Adani project that PM Modi commissioned in Kerala today
intro: Vizhinjam International Seaport: The deep-water port has been developed by Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone Ltd (APSEZ) ? India's largest port developer and part of the Adani Group ? under a public-private partnership.
imagecaption: Vizhinjam International Seaport: 10 things to know about Vizhinjam International Seaport that PM Modi will commission in Kerala today
sliderimages: [{'imageurl': 'https://www.livemint.com/lm-img/img/2025/05/02/original/port_2_1746164077860.jpeg', 'count': '1', 'imagescaption': 'Vizhinjam International Seaport: Strategically located just 10 nautical miles from the busy international shipping route connecting Europe, the Persian Gulf and the Far East, Vizhinjam enjoys inherent locational advantages that position it for success as a global transshipment hub.'}, {'imageurl': 'https://www.livemint.com/lm-img/img/2025/05/02/original/port_3_1746162986107.jpeg', 'count': '2', 'imagescaption': 'Vizhinjam International Seaport: A major milestone came when Vizhinjam berthed the MSC Turkey, one of the largest cargo ships to ever reach India.'}]

headline: Adani Ports, Home First Finance are among key companies to consider dividend today
intro: Dividend Stocks: Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone, Home First Finance Company India, and Sportking India are among the key companies to consider dividends today. These companies' boards will meet today to also consider the financial results for the March 2025 quarter.

headline: Adani Port share price rebounds from today's low after THIS capex update
intro: Adani Ports' shares rose sharply after the announcement of operations at Colombo West International Terminal, a major investment of $800 million. The terminal, developed under a public-private partnership, will enhance cargo handling and is expected to create thousands of jobs in Sri Lanka.
imagecaption: Adani Port share price rebounds from today's low after THIS Capex update

headline: Adani Ports share price edges higher after this business update; Do you own?

imagecaption: Adani Ports share price edges higher after this business update, on Wednesday, April 2.
